G - 01010
H - 01101
I - 01110

To decrypt the provided ciphertext, I will apply the Bacon Cipher decryption method.

The Bacon Cipher uses 5-bit substitution cipher, where the alphabet is replaced by 5-bit binary numbers. The standard mapping is:

A -> 01010
B -> 00101
C -> 00110
D -> 00011
E -> 01100
F -> 01101
G -> 01110
H -> 01111
I -> 00001
J -> 000
